statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM inventory_management ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, last_updated FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT stock_level, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, AVG(stock_level) AS avg_stock_level FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY avg_stock_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 10 AND last_updated < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, last_updated FROM products WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, location_id, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC, date_added ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price < 20 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE location_id = 3 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_id, location_id, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed FROM transactions GROUP BY product_id, location_id HAVING total_quantity_changed > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity_changed DESC;

SELECT p.name, l.location_name, s.quantity FROM products p JOIN stock_levels s ON p.id = s.product_id JOIN locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id WHERE s.quantity < 10 ORDER BY l.location_name ASC, p.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management_products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM inventory_management_warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_management_products WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM inventory_management_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_management_products;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM inventory_management_warehouses;
SELECT product_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM inventory_management_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM inventory_management_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
